prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (intelligent young East-Asian woman:1.2), long smooth (turquoise teal hair:1.1), elegant face, realistic facial features, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (flawless skin texture:1.1), (natural skin subsurface scattering:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching fabric weave texture:1.2), sharp focus, cinematic lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, airbrushed, low quality, (deformed glasses:1.3), (blurry face:1.2), (unrealistic hair:1.3), (messy hair:1.2), (blue stain on face:1.5)
